      • getExtras

        public static void getExtras(TiffImageMetadata exif,
                             java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> bundle)
        Convert JSON string in UserComment to a Map (GeoTakCam images only) Fields include: - ImgPitch (float) - ImgRoll (float) - Inclination (float) - HorizontalFOV (float) - VerticalFOV (float) - Address (string)
